action_item.title: Manage your website content
action_item.desc:
Add and update content on your website like service & treatment listings, social media updates or contact details.

Tip: Keeping your website updated helps get better results.

action_item.desc: You can respond to patient enquiries, schedule and manage all your in-clinic / online consultations.
